tool_description: 🚀 Exciting News: New Taobao (淘宝) and Tmall (天猫) API Services are Available to Use Now! Get the Real Deal!
name: Taobao DataHub
title: Taobao DataHub

api_list.name: Taobao - Item Detail
api_list.description: The `Item Detail` API must be used together with the `Item Search X` API to retrieve the `itemIdStr` value or individually just by providing the `itemId` value. Using this API with `itemId` responses will be quicker and have less margin of error.

optional_parameters.name: itemIdStr
optional_parameters.description:
Obtained from `Taobao - Item Search X` Endpoint. 
Eg.: RlRlTEdLWkR1UjRTbGFGUzh5MlBVdk9OejlLeDA2WCtyK08vR1hYd21ialhHRVVJeTVlODhEeExrbnpjWS9mOA==

api_list.name: Taobao - Item Search [by Image]
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search products with an Image URL.

optional_parameters.name: imgRegion
optional_parameters.description:
Image Region is the search focus position from the given image. Eg.: `120,45,190,150`

![https://i.ibb.co/QmphdGT/img-Region-jpg.png](https://i.ibb.co/QmphdGT/img-Region-jpg.png)

api_list.name: Taobao - Item Review
api_list.description: The `Item Review` API must be used together with the `Item Search X` API to retrieve the `itemIdStr` value or individually just by providing the `itemId` value. Using this API with `itemId` responses will be quicker and have less margin of error.

optional_parameters.name: itemIdStr
optional_parameters.description:
Obtained from `Taobao - Item Search X` Endpoint. 
Eg.: RlRlTEdLWkR1UjRTbGFGUzh5MlBVdk9OejlLeDA2WCtyK08vR1hYd21ialhHRVVJeTVlODhEeExrbnpjWS9mOA==

api_list.name: Taobao - Item Search X [Keyword | Category]
api_list.description: `Item Search X` API, must be used together with `Item Detail X` or any other API supporting `itemIdStr` parameter to retrieve more information about a product or `itemId` value.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Passing this value in Mandarin Chinese language will bring more results.

optional_parameters.name: switches
optional_parameters.description: See 'switchesValues' from the response of this Endpoint for this filter value. Eg.: 'freeShipping' and for multiple separate with coma Eg.: 'freeShipping,tmall'.

api_list.name: Taobao - Item Detail Simple X
api_list.description: The `Item Detail Simple X` API must be used together with the `Item Search X` API to retrieve the `itemIdStr` value.

required_parameters.name: itemIdStr
required_parameters.description: Obtained from `Taobao - Item Search X` Endpoint.
